system.description: With advanced implants and mastery of the Luminen Capacitors, you can project crackling arcs of energy at range to strike down your foes.
system.benefit:
Character can use their Luminen Capacitors to make a ranged attack: Half Action Ballistic Skill Test (counts as Single Attack Action). Character must then pass a Toughness Test or gain a level of Fatigue.

Attack Profile: 1d10+2×WP Bonus Energy Damage, 0 Penetration, Shock Quality.

rollConfig.description: Luminen Blast ranged attack - 1d10+2×WP Energy damage

specialAbilities.name: Luminen Blast
specialAbilities.description: Half Action: Make a Ballistic Skill Test to fire a bolt of energy from your Luminen Capacitors. If you hit, deal 1d10+2×Willpower Bonus Energy damage with 0 Penetration and Shock Quality. After using this ability, you must pass a Toughness Test or gain 1 level of Fatigue.
